thread.title: Jenson Button announces he will race in Formula One next season with McLaren
thread.title_full: Jenson Button announces he will race in Formula One next season with McLaren

title: Jenson Button announces he will race in Formula One next season with McLaren
text:
Jenson Button announces he will race in Formula One next season with McLaren 01 Oct 2015 08:46:57 
comments 
Jenson Button has decided against retirement and will race for McLaren again next season, it has been announced. 
The 35-year-old had been tipped to bring an end to his Formula One career at the end of the 2015 campaign. 
But McLaren revealed in a statement on Thursday morning that he would stay with the team. Related Sport News
